reuo.resources.io

Class AutoCropChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuo.resources.Cropper
      • reuo.resources.io.AutoCropChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Channel, ReadableByteChannel

    public class AutoCropChannel
extends Cropper
implements ReadableByteChannel
    A pass-through Channel that records cropping information about the image as it's being read, treating data as 16-bit pixels with the high-bit being the alpha bit. For example: 
     AutoCropChannel cropper = new AutoCropChannel(dataSource);
 int w = 100, h = 100;
 ByteBuffer image = ByteBuffer.allocate(w * h * 2);
 cropper.prepare(w, h);
 cropper.read(image);
 System.out.println(cropper.getCoordinates());
    will prepare the cropper and read the entire image and print the coordinates of the cropped portion of the image.
    Author:
    Kristopher Ives
